beforeVisit: Tell your child about the visit in a positive way
Explain that the dentist helps keep teeth strong
Read books about visiting the dentist
duringVisit: Stay calm - children feel your emotions

testimonial1.text: Noa loves coming to Dr. Lena! She even asks to go to the dentist. Amazing how they turned a scary experience into a fun one.

testimonial2.text: Tom was afraid of dentists, but the team here worked with him patiently and now he comes happily to every visit.

testimonial3.text: Both my children are treated here and I see how happy and confident they are. The team is simply amazing with children.
